page.title: 19TRANSPORT.
page.content:
{
{Box}is well served by roads.With the{A4}and the{A365}passing though the village.Although 3 bus services stop in the village there are many other services which merely pass through.The congestion and traffic, especially along the{A4}make the centre of{box}a noisy place.A main railway line also runs though the village but the station was closed several years ago. Because of poor standard of public transport there has been a vast increase in the number of private vehicles in the village.The poor parking facilities and double yellow lines have aggravated the situation. Like many other places an improved bus service would solve the problem of living outside an urban area.
